attributes.action: Suggest to the 2012 Olympic Committee that the logo launched on 4th June 2007 should be reconsidered.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo chosen for the 2012 London Olympics does not represent the capital city of the UK nor the superb games that we are expecting to be held there in 2012.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
